scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct the internal workings of a customer credit scoring model by feeding it carefully crafted inputs and observing the outputs.  The goal is to identify the model's vulnerabilities and potentially exploit them for financial gain or identity theft.
initial_goal: Analyze the credit scoring model's accuracy and performance metrics.
constraints: access_restricted_to_sanitized_data: only aggregated statistics are available
no_direct_model_access: only inference API is available
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A competitor is attempting to reverse engineer a proprietary credit scoring model used to assess loan applications.
